form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: PLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF AWFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE OF AN ALIEN

full_text: UNITED STATES bey PARTMENT OF JUSTICE FORM APPROVED IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE wo RECORD 45,20366 DATE FILED FEE STAMP PLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF CONSULATE FRC WFUL PERMANENT RESIDENCE OF AN ALIEN UNITED STATES GENERAL OF AMERICA, OF THE Index In connection with immigrant visa application(s) of my 10, Sp-Search G360 sent relative(s) listed in item 15 below, I request that the JUL 16 1974 American Consul at Guadala jarra Jalisco Mexico be furnished a verification of my lawful admission into the United (City and Country abroad) States for permanent residence. I have read and fully understand the appearing on the reverse of this form concerning the desirability of attaching documentary evidence to prove relationship if the immigrant visa applicant is my parent spouse, or unmarried child under the age of 21 years. 1. MY NAME IS (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) MY ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER IS: VALLE ROBERTO A FOIA (b)(6) 3. MAILING ADDRESS IN U.S. (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) 3917 Wade St. Los Angeles Calif. 90066 4. PERMANENT ADDRESS IN THE U.S. (Number and Street) (City) (State) (Zip Code) same as above 5 MY DATE OF BIRTH IS: (Month) (Day) (Year) 6. MY PLACE OF BIRTH WAS (City) (Country) 7. I AM NOW A CITIZEN OF: (Country) June 7 1937 Union de Tula, Jal, Mexico Mexico 8. MY FATHER'S NAME: 9. MY MOTHER'S FULL MAIDEN NAME: Jose Valle Juana Barajas DATA RELATING TO MY ADMISSION INTO THE UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR MY ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS TO PERMANENT RESIDENT 10. NAME USED WHEN ADMITTED FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS TO PERMANENT RESIDENT: 11. MY U.S. PORT OF ARRIVAL WAS: (Last) (First) (Middle) VALLE BARAJAS ROBERTO San Ysidro, Calif. 12 MY DATE OF ARRIVAL OR ADJUSTMENT WAS: (Month) (Day) (Year) AND THE MEANS OF ARRIVAL WAS: (Show Name of Vessel or Airline and Flight No., etc.) Oct. 21 1972 afoot 13. NAME AND ADDRESS OF PERSON IN THE U.S. TO WHOM I WAS DESTINED: my wife: Eugenia Valle - Los Angeles, Calif. 14 I first obtained an immigrant visa at a United States consular office abroad on (date) (location). At that time, I was was not married. Guadala jara, Jalisco, Mexico 16/73 15. Including my present marriage I have been married 1 times. The name of my present spouse is: Eugenia Valle to whom I was married on 4/29/72 at Los Angeles, Calif, My present spouse is (Check One) (date) (location) PU. S. Citizen a permanent resident neither of these. If married more than one time, list names of previous spouse(s) and places and dates of marriage and explain how marriage(s) were terminated: a 16. THE PERSONS IN WHOSE BEHALF SUCH INFORMATION IS REQUESTED ARE AS FOLLOWS: FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH JUANA BARAJAS DE VALLE 5/5/14 - Union de Tula, Jalisco, Mexico RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS Mother Calle Nuevo Leon #44 - Union de Tula, Jalisco, Mexico FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS FULL NAME DATE AND PLACE OF BIRTH RELATIONSHIP ADDRESS NOT TO BE FILLED OUT BY APPLICANT 17. FULL SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT AS NOW USED The Secretary of State is hereby informed that the applicant named above was was-not lawfully admitted for permanent residence. Robert Valle. His "A" file shows date of first admission for permanent residence as 10/21/72 symbol IR-1 issuing post and/date of issuance of IV 10/6/72 marital status at time of first admission - Single; Married; Divorced; Widowed. File does does not establish relationship between applicant herein and visa applicant. Verification made from Form 151 showing lawful residence of INS OFFICE: Date: June 15,1974 Das Angeles personally presented Caly by applicant Verifier: Juanita permanent Virduzer IND contact USINS FORM 1.550 (REV. 2.1.73)N
